item.description:
Rawbert's Organic Cafe Sunday Brunch - May 18 @ 11 AM

The 2nd Saturday ROC event has been quite full lately so we have added this 2nd monthly event at Rawbert's Organic Cafe. This is our first weekend brunch event.

http://www.organicgar...

Rawbert's Organic Cafe is dedicated to providing truly pure healthful and vibrant food. Requiring not only a sound approach procedurally to buying, storing, & handling, but an intuitive approach moment by moment to the daily use of our whole foods in recipes and on the plate. As we constantly ask the question: 'Is it fresh, pure, nourishing? Are we happy with this? Will the customer love this?'

Rawbert's goal is to be the place for those who seek the highest form of simple or gourmet nourishment and we invite individuals with all types of food sensitivities to dine at Rawbert's Organic Cafe or purchase its products over the web.


Rawbert's Organic Cafe

There is a park on the ocean that we could visit afterwards if the weather is nice. Percy F. Lyons Park is only 6 blocks down Dane St. at the intersection of Dane St. and Lothrup St. To find it on a map, visit http://maps.google.co... and enter Percy F. Lyons Park, Beverly, MA or 111 Lothrup St., Beverly, MA.

-------------------------------
Boston Raw Food Group posted files, please check the files section
http://rawfood.meetup...

To promote the BRFG, please print out and post our tear-strip flyer
http://files.meetup.c...

For upcoming events, please check the calendar
http://rawfood.meetup...

For other raw events around New England, please visit
http://www.NewEngland... .

You may make an optional small contribution to our Meetup group via PayPal to elliott7 [@] comcast.net . Please email after a donation so we may send a thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Boston Rawfood Meetup table signs.
item.name: Rawbert's Organic Cafe Sunday Brunch
